title: Mecha Rengar
body: Ok not my Idea but i love it and im sure most have seen this skin idea. But mecha rengar looks so awesome and was just wondering if it is going to be an actual skin.

replies.body: i just want an omega squad rengar, and for him to look like the predator off of the predator movies lol
yeah that and a Mecha Gnar

Thanks a lot man. Can you give me proof just so i can know 100% cause i dont wana get excited and save rp for a let down. cause gentle man gnar came out so i dont think there gonna be a mecha one but wouldnt be suprised.
This would be so frickin awesome if this was made into a skin!!!!!!
Holy Shit That is an amazing splash art! Riot should definitely at least consider doing this as a skin down the line. It's so gorgeous
